about.title: OUR STORY
about.subtitle: Discover the story and vision of Hackboot, Estonian leader in next-generation cloud gaming

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Hackboot is an innovative technology company specialized in high-performance cloud gaming solutions.
overview.vmcloudDesc: We are part of the VMCloud Group, a leader in enterprise cloud solutions and innovative technologies.
overview.establishedDesc: Founded in Estonia with a clear vision: revolutionize the gaming industry through the cloud.
overview.mission: We build premium gaming experiences with uncompromising security.
overview.vision: A trusted ecosystem for competitive players and creators.

timeline.subtitle: From game keys to cloud gaming leader

event1.title: Hackboot Creation
event1.description: Launch of the company with game key sales. First customer base in the gaming market, establishing our reputation.

event2.title: Strategic Pivot
event2.description: Transition to custom software development in the gaming field. Deep technical expertise and continuous innovation.

event3.title: Cloud Gaming Revolution
event3.description: Launch of our cloud gaming platform with focus on professional tools. Immediate success and exponential growth.

event4.title: VMCloud Expansion
event4.description: Integration into VMCloud Group and expansion of generalized cloud services. New era of growth and innovation.

faq.title: Got questions?
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to the most common questions

questions.question: Is Hackboot legal?
questions.answer: Yes, Hackboot operates under Estonian jurisdiction where the development and use of game modifications are entirely legal. We strictly comply with all applicable laws and are a registered and licensed company in Estonia (VMCloud Group O√ú).

questions.question: What games are supported?
questions.answer: We support over 10 popular games including Valorant, Apex Legends, Overwatch 2, Fortnite, Call of Duty Warzone, CS2, Rainbow Six Siege, PUBG, and Rust. New titles are added regularly.

questions.question: How does security work?
questions.answer: We use multi-layer kernel-level protection with integrated HWID spoofer. Our technology is undetectable with 0% detection on all platforms. E2E encryption and 24/7 monitoring to guarantee your security.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time without hidden fees or commitments. Your access remains active until the end of the paid period.

questions.question: What hardware is required?
questions.answer: No specific hardware required! Hackboot runs entirely in the cloud. You just need a stable internet connection (minimum 10 Mbps) and a modern browser.

questions.question: How does customer support work?
questions.answer: Our support is available 24/7 via Discord, email, and WhatsApp. Average response time under 5 minutes. For premium customers, a dedicated account manager is available.

questions.question: Is there a trial period?
questions.answer: We offer different plans suited to all needs. You can start with our Essential Pack from ‚Ç¨27.90/month to test our services before upgrading to a higher plan.

questions.question: What performance can I expect?
questions.answer: Our servers equipped with RTX 4090 and i9-13900K offer exceptional performance: 240+ FPS at 1080p, <5ms latency, and 99.9% guaranteed uptime. Performance varies according to your chosen plan.

finalCTA.title: Join the gaming elite
finalCTA.subtitle: Start your Hackboot adventure today. Maximum performance, total security, 24/7 support.

careers.title: Let's build the future of gaming together
careers.subtitle: Join a passionate team pushing the boundaries of cloud gaming. Work on innovative projects with cutting-edge technologies.

senior-fullstack-developer.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
senior-fullstack-developer.shortDescription: Build innovative cloud gaming solutions with React, Node.js, and cutting-edge cloud technologies.
senior-fullstack-developer.description: We're looking for a passionate senior full stack developer to join our engineering team. You'll work on our cloud gaming platform, developing innovative features and optimizing performance.
responsibilities: Design and develop full stack features (React, Next.js, Node.js)
Collaborate with product team to define technical roadmaps
Participate in code reviews and improve code quality
requirements: 5+ years experience in full stack development
Knowledge of cloud architectures (AWS, GCP, Azure)

cloud-architect.title: Cloud Architect
cloud-architect.shortDescription: Design and deploy our highly available and scalable cloud gaming infrastructure.
cloud-architect.description: We're seeking an experienced cloud architect to design and maintain our cloud gaming infrastructure. You'll be responsible for architecture, scalability, and platform reliability.
responsibilities: Design multi-region high availability cloud architecture
requirements: Expertise in AWS, GCP or Azure (certification preferred)
Deep knowledge of networking and cloud security

security-engineer.title: Security Engineer
security-engineer.shortDescription: Protect our infrastructure and users with cutting-edge security solutions.
security-engineer.description: Join our security team to develop and maintain our protection systems. You'll work on anti-cheat technologies, kernel-level security, and data protection.
responsibilities: Monitor and respond to security incidents
Train team on security best practices
requirements: Expertise in reverse engineering and malware analysis

senior-frontend-developer.title: Senior Frontend Developer
senior-frontend-developer.shortDescription: Create exceptional user interfaces with React, Next.js, and latest web technologies.
senior-frontend-developer.description: We're looking for a senior frontend developer to create exceptional user experiences. You'll work on our dashboard, website, and gaming interfaces.
responsibilities: Create smooth animations with Framer Motion
Contribute to design system and component library
requirements: Mastery of Tailwind CSS, CSS/JS animations
Experience with Framer Motion or similar
UX/UI sensitivity and attention to detail

product-designer.title: Product Designer
product-designer.shortDescription: Design innovative user experiences for our cloud gaming platform.
product-designer.description: We're looking for a talented product designer to shape our platform's future. You'll work on UX/UI, design system, and user research.
responsibilities: Design UX/UI interfaces for web and applications
Conduct user research and usability testing
requirements: Mastery of Figma, design systems, atomic design
Experience in user research and testing

customer-success-manager.title: Customer Success Manager
customer-success-manager.shortDescription: Support our premium clients and ensure their satisfaction at every step.
customer-success-manager.description: Join our support team to deliver exceptional customer experience to our premium users. You'll be the main point of contact for our clients.
responsibilities: Manage a portfolio of premium clients
Ensure onboarding and training of new clients
requirements: Knowledge of gaming and cloud technologies
Ability to manage multiple clients simultaneously

devops-engineer.title: DevOps Engineer
devops-engineer.shortDescription: Automate and optimize our CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure.
devops-engineer.description: We're looking for a DevOps engineer to automate our processes and optimize our infrastructure. You'll work on Kubernetes, CI/CD, and monitoring.
responsibilities: Participate in on-call and resolve incidents
requirements: Experience with GitLab CI, GitHub Actions or Jenkins

backend-developer-go.title: Backend Developer Go
backend-developer-go.shortDescription: Develop performant and scalable backend services with Go and cloud technologies.
backend-developer-go.description: Join our backend team to build highly performant services. You'll work with Go, gRPC, Kafka, and distributed databases.
